name: matlab-style-sections
description: MATLAB-like %% sections with dividers, folding, and emphasized titles across languages.

matlabSections.decorateHeader.description: Render section header line text with stronger style.

matlabSections.showDivider.description: Render a horizontal divider under each %% section header.

matlabSections.indentAware.description: Only fold lines that are indented at least as much as the section header.
